name: Treeiors
description:
#The Star Store, the Trolley, and the Water Tank are for phone users only!

Treeiors  is a strategy game that gets harder as you progress, in which the player tries to plant different trees in different fields to climb up the ranks and achieve the goals while fighting wildfires.

There are more than 15 types of seeds and trees, each type has different characteristics, and each type of trees can be upgraded 100 times, and with the increase in the level of the field used for planting trees, the value of extinguishing the burning of the field fires increases as-well, based on the type of the planted tree and its level.

When planting a field, a bar appears below the field. When the bar is filled, the field produces a number of coins that can be used to upgrade the field, extinguish wildfires, or donate to the "Earth Fund", which is a cabin that players can donated to, and in return obtain various gifts, such as the arrival of a new visitor to the garden, reducing fire time .. etc.

The game has a special weather system, where the sounds, lighting and atmosphere vary depending on the time, in addition to the day and night cycle, a light rain or a thunderstorm may occur.

Each visitor to the garden has a different conversation, which can be accessed by clicking on the visitor and following the progress of the conversation.

The development of the game took about 7 months, from programming, graphics, in addition to producing some sound effects in the game such as the night theme.

Although the game has one interface, it has more than half a million code, and more than 5500 lines of code, as it contains many systems, both complex and simple, such as the save and load system, the tree removal system, the upgrading system, and the wildfires and firefighting system, which has more than 1,600 different possibilities, in addition to the game store, seed store, weather, morning and night cycle and their relation to time, and other systems.

The game is released on Android, and under review on iOS.
